column4: Hello, does anyone know how to get around the "bios age(1999) fails cutoff(2000)" problem?
that reminds me of the millenium bug,.,.lol
I have read comments about the millennium bug several times when googling the problem.

the milennium bug was a bios problem due to the fact that they could not understand that there could be any date after 31/12/1999 ,.,. a bios update usually fixed the problem i think ,.,. but do u/ have u ever had a syystem without this error?
I have got that error on all old computers I've tried to install it on.
is ur machines bios fully up-to-date?
is ur bios up to date?
It's an old PC, the bios is from that date I wrote, 07/29/1999
I guess
Hard to find information about it
yer i no,.,. find out wot motherboard ur using then search google for newer bios's
ul have to make a bootable floppy to install the new bios
I have the latest bios for my motherboard.
r u saying that a motherboard u have has no idea that the world doesnt end on the date u said earlier?
Is it simply enough impossible to install an ubuntu system on a computer from before 2000 ?
NO ,.,. i have succesfully solved this problem
Not really sure what you mean. The system clock is correct, but the bios is from 07/29/1999.
so wots the problem?
Well I get that error message, that should be pretty obvious from my first message here. :P
wot error message ,.,. sorry didnt c it?
the message disappears when using noacpi , but it can't identify the format of the disk when partitioning.
bios age(1999) fails cutoff(2000)
yer trust me that is an outdated bios,.,. u DONT HAVE THE LATEST BIOS
And you are sure of that, just like that, without knowing when the motherboard was stopped made?
I can't even find my specific board on the manufacturor's homepage. I'm pretty sure I'm shit out of luck when it comes to bios updating.
either im right or the motherboard ur using is 1 of a kind and no one has fixed the milennium bug
have u googled ur motherboard name?
Well. Yes. Otherwise I wouldn't be in this room.
Maybe it does not have to do with the millennium bug.
since it can't identify the format of my drive, and freezes.
so no one else in the entire world has the same motherboard as u?
I have only found a few sites with the same board.
but haven't found anyone having the same problem as I, with ubuntu.
can u give me the full name of ur motherboard
wait
ur problem ISNT with ubuntu ,.,. its with ur bios ,.,. tahts b4 an os is even started
When I boot up the PC I see the following:   07/29/1999-SiS-620-P6SET-MLC-00   and   p6SET-ML Ver 1.2 07/29/1999
plz post just the name of  the motherboard
That is the letters and digits I have as information about the board.
I do -not- have any manual to it.
does ur mother board look like this ,.,.--,.,. http://www.fujitsu-siemens.co.uk/rl/servicesupport/techsupport/Consumer/Archive/P6SET-ML/P6SET-ML.htm
That could be it, yes.
kk ,.,. give me a few mins to use the power of google
A few minutes,, I really have to go to bed asap. =P
do u want a solution ,.,. or am i wasting my time
I want a solution, but I'm here tomorrow too
or you could e-mail tips...?
I've been up like 38 hours, so I'm pretty dozey
give me ur email then,.,. ha ive done the same ,.,.lol
insertdacoin@hotmail.com   Thank you for your time and excuse my aggressiveness, I've been trying to get the scrap to work forever now and is a -little- irritable....
i no ,.,. dw,.,. i look for fixes ,.,. my email is bodssocks@hotmail.com ,.,. do u no how to update a bios?
that email is wrong,.,. its bodssocks:yahoo.co.uk
I have not done it before, but it shouldn't be very hard, should it?
no its bodssocks@yahoo.co.uk
its complicatedly confusing ,.,. il talk u through it sometime ,.,. when we get there ,.,.
I forgot to say this, when I boot, it also says "award modular bios v4.51PG", just found it among my notes
now that is so annoyingly confusing im gonna be up all nite jsut findong out wtf is going on ,,.lol,.,. il email u tonite with some findings and arrange a time to meet on here to fix it
I am sorry, I will not have access to internet more than..er.. (I'm in Sweden, so the time's not "right"...)  ... for 24 hours, I think.
ok im in england but i stay up late lol,.,. just reply to my email when u can and we should have it fixed soon
cya m8
that's great, I'll probably be online all day tomorrow. I'll see you then! Good night and by!
Did you find anything useful for the board? :)
check ur email,.,. i need u to email me the info again ,.,. sorry
sorry, forgot that I gave you my second address. :(
lol
Can we have a separate conversation here instead so it's easier to talk?
yer ive started one
go here -- http://freenode.net/faq.shtml#privmsg
Ok, understood, let's just talk here then
hang on m8
did you lose the mb info I gave you yesterday?
yer ,.,. soz
go her ,.,. http://freenode.net/faq.shtml#privmsg
I can't load the page, we'll have to take it here
copy and paste the link into ur browser manually
Do you need the mobo strings I sent yesterday...?
yer
done that, but the site can't load.
site loads fine for me ,.,. lol
P6SET-ML Ver 1.2
Not sure which is necessary.
lol ,.,. me neither
ouch dude this is windows 98 territory,,. f**k me thats old
It's old school, baby!
this isnt looking promising,.,. ive found a similiar page with the same prob as u,.,. let me go ask my old man ,.,. he fixed the millennium bug for a living
seems strange though that that would be the problem since XP ran well
xp does not rely soul'ly on the bios,.,. erm,.,. i have good news and bad news ,.,. which do u want first?
bad

u were rite,.,. i am unable to find an update to ur bios,.,. good news-- it doesnt have to cost u a forune to get a new motherboard that has a better driver,. however a GOOD motherboard will cost u a small fortune,.,.lol
sorry
Okay, that sucks. Yeah I've seen mobtherboards good enough for maybe 500 SEK , it's not that much.
but thanks for your time and work anyway
